name: Tuesday Evening
description:
Sun is going down, another day of confinement is ending as her cigarette is burning.

Her phone is her only way to check on her relatives.

Play as her, learn more about her life and send messages to people!

Made for the #advjam2020!

(Please note that some bugs may still be occuring in the game)

MADE BY

Charlotte ADAMOWICZ - design & programming

Gabin JIRODET - design & writing

MADE with

unity

ink
